The Business Journals • 3/9/2020
Large U.S. school districts close as coronavirus cases rise
New York Governor Andrew Cuomo identified a New York City suburb as a "hot spot" for coronavirus and the fifth-largest school district in California closed its doors as new cases of the illness continued to crop up and public health officials argued for a nationwide mitigation strategy.
Reuters • 3/9/2020
Is it really a good idea to close schools to fight coronavirus?
Students in the Lake Washington School District in the Seattle suburbs were so nervous about the novel coronavirus that they started a petition urging officials to close the schools. No one in a classroom had been diagnosed with the disease, but more than 15 people in the region had died of it, and students thought: Why take a chance?

Family breaks quarantine attending father-daughter dance, prompting school closure
They left the dance immediately after. Sunday afternoon, Page said the coronavirus patient has been acting responsibly and maturely but her father “did not act consistently with the health department’s instructions and instead … he decided to take his daughter to a school function.” Page said the county learned about the father-daughter ...
East Bay Times • 3/9/2020
School Closures Over Coronavirus in New York and New Jersey
Here is a growing list of public and private schools, as well as colleges and universities, that have suspended or altered classes in the local effort to curb the outbreak.
New York Times • 3/9/2020
Two school districts closed due to coronavirus threat
Schools in Williston and the Windham Southwest School District are closed Monday, in response to concerns about the coronavirus. The school closures, the first in the state, come after the first Vermont patient tested positive for COVID-19 on Saturday. As of Monday, 28 Vermonters had tested negative for the virus, according to the Department of ...
VTDigger • 3/9/2020
NY coronavirus update: plans for paid sick leave, school closings; inmates to make hand sanitizer
New York’s prisoners are going to ramp up production of state-manufactured hand sanitizer, which will be distributed to schools, state agencies and other government offices, Gov. Andrew Cuomo said today. The effort comes as New York has 142 confirmed cases of coronavirus, Cuomo said at today’s 11 a.m. briefing. All but two of those cases ...
syracuse.com • 3/9/2020
CT schools prep for possible coronavirus-related closures
For several weeks, some public and private schools across Connecticut have been testing virtual learning practices to prepare for potential closings due to the coronavirus threat. On Monday, that possibility seemed very real after Sacred Heart University and the University of New Haven announced they were canceling in-person classes for most of ...
Connecticut Post • 3/9/2020
Coronavirus Closures Hit Law Schools at Stanford, Columbia and Several Others
Concerns over the spread of the coronavirus are beginning to upend law school operations, with more disruptions likely in the coming week. At least five law schools in New York, California and Washington State have now canceled in-person classes or closed outright amid worries that students and employees could be exposed to COVID-19.

There were no reported cases of coronavirus connected to any of the Maine ... a regular basis and have collaborated on smaller issues during the school year such as winter weather closings,” Gill said.

Connecticut high school tournaments will continue as coronavirus concerns intensify
“The CIAC is collaborating with the office of the Commissioner of Education (SDE) and Department of Public Health (DPH) to stay up to date on how the coronavirus is impacting Connecticut schools. At this time, no schools in Connecticut have been closed,” the CIAC said in a statement. The CIAC said it has worked with member schools to ...

Coronavirus in NY: Schools may be closed ‘for weeks,’ Cuomo says
Gov. Cuomo warned Monday that some New York schools could be closed for weeks because of the coronavirus. ”If a student tests positive in a school, the school is closed for an initial 24-hour period so we can do an assessment,’’ the governor said at a press conference. If there are continued concerns about the facility after that ...

What Happened When Hong Kong’s Schools Went Virtual to Combat the Spread of Coronavirus
He’s dressed in a fleece shark costume, his preferred attire when not forced to wear his school uniform. This is what "school" looks like these days here in Hong Kong. Because of the coronavirus outbreak, all schools, including my son's private bilingual preschool, have been closed since January, and won’t reopen until late April at the ...

Coronavirus in Massachusetts: Student’s parent being tested for virus forces Plainville schools to close, sanitize buildings
Worcester’s St. Mary’s School was closed Monday after a family member of one of the school’s staff was in contact with someone who tested positive for the coronavirus. The total number of COVID-19 cases in Massachusetts as of Sunday was at 28, with one confirmed case and 27 presumptive positive cases.
MassLive • 3/9/2020
Coronavirus: Northern Ireland schools close over positive case
Two schools in Northern Ireland have been closed for a deep clean after a student tested positive for coronavirus, Health Minister Robin Swann has said. The minister said the schools are located on the same site. Meanwhile, St Gall's Gaelic Athletic Club in west Belfast has confirmed that one of its members - an adult - has coronavirus.
BBC • 3/9/2020
The father and sister of a Missouri woman suspected of having coronavirus broke quarantine to attend a school dance. Then she tested positive.
A woman returned from studying abroad in Italy feeling sick. She self-quarantined, but her father and sister didn't.

Coronavirus catch-up: Weekend brings California school closures, cruise news, SNL skit
To get caught up, here are updates on some of the major developments from late last week and through the weekend as confirmed infections, closures and cancellations related to the coronavirus continue to mount. Elk Grove Unified School District will “close its schools, cancel classes and any student-related activities from (Saturday), March 7 ...

Coronavirus-related CT school closures a local decision, for now

Missouri coronavirus quarantine violation closes schools in St. Louis
Two Catholic schools in suburban St. Louis have temporarily closed and some students at a third school have been told to stay home after the father of the first person in Missouri to become ill with the coronavirus attended a dance with another child.Amtrak also is cleaning a train the ill woman took to Missouri from Chicago.St. Louis County ...
KMBC • 3/9/2020
COVID-19 And The Catch-22 Of School Closure
When it comes to closing—or not closing—schools in response to the coronavirus, it’s easy to play quarterback on Monday morning. Take a moment to appreciate the impossible, competing demands we have placed on school leaders.

In the U.S., as of Thursday, just a small number of schools are closed in Washington, California ...

Act on the news with POLITICO Pro. — School administrators are stepping up closures as the coronavirus spreads throughout the country, affecting both colleges and K-12 schools. — Education Secretary Betsy DeVos’ brother, security contractor Erik Prince, has been recruiting veteran spies to infiltrate liberal groups, including an American ...

Expect more California schools to close amid coronavirus spread, Newsom says
The largest school district in Northern California, Elk Grove Unified School District, canceled classes and sports games through Friday amid the growing spread of the coronavirus. Murrieta Valley High School in Murrieta will be closed Monday, as well Lowell and Riordan high schools in San Francisco. Stanford University will begin online classes ...

School districts in NY, CA close over coronavirus fears

Reuters • 3/9/2020
Indiana elementary school closed for 2 weeks after student tests positive for coronavirus
Avon Community School Corporation has announced the closure of Hickory Elementary School for two weeks—Monday March 9 through Friday March 20—after notification by the Hendricks County Health Department that a student from Hickory Elementary tested positive for COVID-19/Coronavirus. Additionally, all schools in the district will be closed ...

Map: Coronavirus and School Closures
The coronavirus outbreak in the United States is prompting K-12 education leaders to shut down individual schools or entire districts. Track where closures are happening and how many students are being affected. Read Education Week's full coverage of the novel coronavirus and its impact on schools here. As of March 6, 2020, 189 schools have ...
Education Week • 3/9/2020
Newmarket schools closed after staffer rode on bus with coronavirus patient
Newmarket schools were closed Monday after a school employee rode on a bus with someone diagnosed with the COVID-19 coronavirus. Superintendent Susan Givens notified the school community of the closure shortly before 10 p.m. on Sunday after receiving a phone call from the employee. According to Givens, the staffer, who is not a teacher ...
New Hampshire Union Leader • 3/9/2020
Missouri Coronavirus Patient's Family Break Quarantine, Attend School Dance
Villa Duchesne canceled classes on Monday after receiving word of the student’s connection with a coronavirus patient. Director of Communications and Marketing Alice Dickherber said the school does not yet know for how long it will remain closed. The school, and the Ritz-Carlton hotel, did not immediately respond to TIME’s request for comment.
Time • 3/9/2020
